entry.ns0:title: Smoke King Kerosene Lighter – Refillable Silver Stick Lighter for Cigarettes & Cigars, Retro Brass Body Open Flame Windproof Pocket Lighter for Men
entry.ns0:description: This bamboo-shaped kerosene lighter combines retro charm with timeless craftsmanship, making it a must-have for vintage enthusiasts and collectors. Available in red copper or brass, its high-quality copper body ensures durability while adding a rustic aesthetic. The sand wheel ignition and bottom-fill kerosene tank offer ease of use, making it both functional and stylish. Perfect as a thoughtful gift, this unique trench lighter is ideal for anyone who values fine design and creativity.
